titleStmt.title: A full and perfect account of the particulars of the terrible and bloody fight which the Christian army have obtain'd over the whole Turkish forces near the bridge of Esseck with a particular of what plunder they have seiz'd and taken / written from a Person of quality who was present in the whole action.
titleStmt.author: Person of quality.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
